review: Lots of problems with my wifi setup,I had to buy a new router, and it still appears that there are some problems with the amount of data that can be transmitted. However, it now works very well
author: David C. Miller

review: Plugged it in and it worked great! Set up was quick and easy, no problems.
author: Dan Madigan

review: Amazon has done an "end-run" on Chromecast.Easier to set up.  Supports access to Netflix, Hulu, and PBS programming (registrations or subscriptions required)
author: zazen_tao "Zaz"

review: Very easy to install and I have experienced no buffering while watching movies. Great product.

review: I love the fire stick so much I bought one for my brother.

review: I am LOVING this!!!! buy it!!!! I would not change a thing. easy to install, easy to operate.

review: I was disappointed that it does not seem to mirror my Samsung desktop with Microsoft software.
